data.title: Fosfor celebrates customer and partner excellence and innovation with 2024 Foton Awards
data.meta_description: Mars, Otis, Snowflake, Fivetran, and Goldensource recognized during the annual Foton event.
data.text:
Mars, Otis, Snowflake, Fivetran, and Goldensource recognized during the annual Foton event.

WARREN, USA and MUMBAI, India — Fosfor, a product division of LTIMindtree [NSE: LTIM, BSE: 540005], a global technology consulting and digital solutions company, at its Foton 2024 event in February 2024, recognized a distinguished group of customers and partners who have demonstrated exemplary commitment, creativity, and ingenuity to create unique business value by leveraging Fosfor capabilities.

The awards and their winners are; Curiosity Catalyst Award to Mars Wrigley, for exceptional commitment to curiosity-driven exploration and innovation in leveraging modern data solutions with Fosfor. Modern Data Maestro Award to Otis, for bold and strategic investments in the modern data stack, and commitment to advancing their data-to-decisions journey with Fosfor as a trusted partner. Fosfor Fusion Award to Snowflake, for the remarkable collaboration and synergy with Fosfor. Fosfor Excellence Award to Goldensource, for crafting joint solutions, leveraging cutting-edge technologies, and serving as catalysts for sparking curiosity and innovative solutions in the ESG domain. Fosfor Emerging Tech Enabler Award to Fivetran, for igniting the most captivating and stimulating conversations to foster a culture of curiosity within the Fosfor ecosystem.

“We are privileged to work with so many curious, innovative Fosfor stakeholders,” said Debasis Satpathy, Chief Business Officer, Fosfor. “The unifying theme across our customers, partners, and Fosforites is that we all deeply understand that the unbridled pursuit of curiosity is a driving force of innovation and ultimately better business outcomes. Both our customer and partner winners exemplify the spirit of curiosity in their respective areas, and we look forward to achieving even more with them with the Fosfor Decision Cloud in the future.”

“On behalf of Mars, I’m honored to accept the ‘Curiosity Catalyst” award from our friends at Fosfor,” said Sanjana Mangat, Associate Director, Human Insights of Mars Wrigley. “Fosfor has been a game-changer in terms of the value it’s helped us unlock in our business and has truly enabled us to transform our curiosity into deeper insights, better decisions, and improved business outcomes. We can’t wait to see how much more we can accomplish with the Fosfor Decision Cloud as we roll it out within our organization. Thanks, Fosfor!”

“Working with the Fosfor team to build our partnership over the past year has been incredibly rewarding, and we greatly appreciate that collaboration and the recognition that comes with the Fosfor Excellence Award,” said Neill Vanlint, Senior Vice President, Head of Partnerships, Goldensource. “We see huge synergies between our data schemas and Fosfor’s AI capabilities and anticipate that our collaborative solutions will create massive business impact for our capital markets clients as we continue to jointly develop those solutions and bring them to market.”

About Fosfor

The Fosfor Decision Cloud is a connected fabric that unifies and amplifies the value promised by the modern data ecosystem, which is made up of infrastructure, data, and application clouds. Fosfor enables organizations to effectively curate data, generate impactful insights, and formulate effective decisions to deliver the long-sought promise of data and AI: optimal business outcomes. Fosfor is part of LTIMindtree, a global technology consulting and digital solutions company. For more information, visit www.fosfor.com.

About LTIMindtree
